all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Murmur not because of the things which thou hast not seen, for they are withheld from thee and from the world, which is wisdom in me in a time to come.
Doctrine and Covenants 25:4
Quote of the Day
"To sustain means to hold up another person, to give them our attention, to be faithful to their trust, to act upon their words."
Ronald A. Rasband | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
